  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030418</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030418</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Características de los cinco reinos</string>
            <string language="en">The characteristics of the five kingdoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Eigenschaften der fünf Königreiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les caractéristiques des cinq royaumes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As características dos cinco reinos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le caratteristiche dei cinque regni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα χαρακτηριστικά των πέντε βασίλειων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se describen los distintos criterios de clasificación de los seres vivos a lo largo de la Historia y una tabla que expone las características más importantes de los cinco reinos de la clasificación de Margulis.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic describing the different classification criteria for living beings throughout history with a table which presents the most important characteristics of the five kingdoms of Margulis's classification.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">características reinos</string>
            <string language="en">characteristics kingdoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die unterschiedlichen 
Klassifikationkriterien für lebende Wesen während der Geschichte mit
einer Tabelle beschreibt, die die wichtigsten Eigenschaften der fünf 
Königreiche der Klassifikation Marguliss darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décrivant les différents critères de 
classification pour les êtres vivants à travers l'histoire avec une 
table qui présente les caractéristiques les plus importantes des 
cinq royaumes de la classification de Margulis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que descreve os critérios diferentes da 
classificação para seres vivos durante todo o history com uma tabela
que apresente as características as mais importantes dos cinco reinos
da classificação de Margulis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che descrive i test di verifica 
differenti di classificazione per gli esseri viventi attraverso la 
storia con una tabella che presenta le caratteristiche più importanti
dei cinque regni della classificazione del Margulis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που περιγράφει τα διαφορετικά κριτήρια 
ταξινόμησης για τα ζωντανά οντα καθ' όλη τη διάρκεια της ιστορίας
με έναν πίνακα που παρουσιάζει τα σημαντικότερα χαρακτηριστικά 
των πέντε βασίλειων της ταξινόμησης Margulis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eigenschaften Königreiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">royaumes de caractéristiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reinos das características</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regni di caratteristiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βασίλεια χαρακτηριστικών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
